comment: Construction patterns form a partial sequence encoded via predecessor and successor relationships, instead of explicit priorities in single sequence.
Whether asset and relationship types are used only during construction.
Secondary threat causes can be expressed as TWAS, and primary threat causes as MS.
Packages are designed in such a way that if a dependent package is omitted, it does not cause problems in packages that package depends.
Whether the model is designed for expansion adding Min and Max members for each entity that can have or be associated with a population level.
Threats and CSG have flags indicating for which type(s) of risk calculations they are relevant.
Threats have flags indicating if they model secondary threats or normal operational processes.
